---
title: Attention Deficits
---



- Inattentive or distractible 
    - Low arousal level, fatigue 
- Sustained, focused, alternating, divided attention
- Sustained: maintain consistent response during a continuous activity
- Focused (selective): ability to attend to a task despite all of the other stimuli around
- Alternating: ability to move flexibly between tasks and respond appropriately to demands of each
- Divided: capacity to respond to 2+ stimuli
- Remedial tx suggestions: awareness, grade environment, set timing/speed limits, speak clearly, simply, slowly, amplify critical stimuli
